Odd Facts & Trivia.name: Florida's Final Spark
Odd Facts & Trivia.description: Delve into some quirky and surprising facts about the Sunshine State, from its infamous electric chair to the antics of Donald Duck. Prepare for a jolt of trivia!

questions.text: What is the nickname of Florida's controversial death row electric chair?
What are the names of Donald Duck's three nephews?
What's the popular name of the breakfast meal consisting of sausages wrapped in pancakes?

Odd Facts & Trivia.name: Brand Name Brain Teasers
Odd Facts & Trivia.description: Test your knowledge of iconic brands and familiar faces. From credit card colors to talking toys, this quiz will challenge your pop culture recall.

questions.text: What colors are the two circles in the MasterCard logo?
Which of these toys answers questions?
What color is Pepto-Bismol liquid?

Odd Facts & Trivia.name: Landmark Lore
Odd Facts & Trivia.description: Explore the fascinating details behind some of America's most recognizable landmarks and symbols. From record speeds to Uncle Sam's beard, get ready for a historical head-scratcher.

questions.text: What is the normal playback speed of a 12" long-playing record?
What color is Uncle Sam's goatee?
How many spikes are on the Statue of Liberty's crown?
An airplane's black box is usually what color?
How much does Peanuts character Lucy charge for her psychiatric advice?
